name: wic-mentorship-application
description: WiC outlines the application requirements for mentees.

events.content: How do I apply for the WiC mentorship program this quarter?
Go to https://wic.calpoly.edu/mentorship and fill out the mentee form by Jan 25 at 11:59 p.m. Include your focus areas so we can match you.
WiC pairs you based on availability and interests. Matches go out the following Monday.
